item.description:
Sergei Boutenko, author and wild edible hike leader, will speak on “The Miracle of Greens” - how Greens can Save Your Life, Saturday, May 30th 3:00 – 5:00 pm at the First Presbyterian Church (downstairs room) 34 Alder St., Waltham, MA 02453. $20 includes smoothie sample and handouts. Come and see how greens and wild edibles can transform the way you feel while simultaneously pleasing your taste buds!

Sponsored by Optimum Health Solution. Questions, call Betsy Bragg 781-899-6664 or cell 617-835-2913. (For directions, see Calendar of Events in www.OptimumHealthSolution.org.)

Co-sponsored by Martha Muehe, www.essenic.org, and SuperfoodPro.com
item.name: Sergei Boutenko in Waltham, MA
